data.title: Terence Cole, Marcol Intl Asset Management Ltd: Profile and Biography
data.meta_description: Terence Cole is Co-Chairman/Co-CEO/Co-Founder at Marcol Intl Asset Management Ltd. See Terence Cole's compensation, career history, education, & memberships.
data.text:
Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world
